name: HTMLSelectElement.setCustomValidity
description: The HTMLSelectElement.setCustomValidity() method sets the custom validity message for the selection element to the specified message. Use the empty string to indicate that the element does not have a custom validity error.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLSelectElement.setCustomValidity()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
